bodySMTPHealthCheck._description: Request to create a new smtp test email.
bodySMTPHealthCheck._email_description: The email recipient of the health request.
bodySMTPHealthCheck._subject_description: The email subject of the health request.
bodySMTPHealthCheck._body_description: The email body of the health request.

bodyCreateOC._id_description: The new online course's ID. If not supplied one will be created.
bodyCreateOC.name: GUIA-CED-OC-
bodyCreateOC._languageCode_description:
The [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1) Alpha-2 language code of the course.
            
With the exception that Simplified Chinese is 'zh' and Traditional Chinese is 'zh-Hant'.

bodyCreateCompetencyCategory._description: Request to create a new competency category.
bodyCreateCompetencyCategory._id_description: The new competency category's ID. If not supplied one will be created.
bodyCreateCompetencyCategory._name_description: The name of the competency category.
bodyCreateCompetencyCategory.name: Competency Category 2
bodyCreateCompetencyCategory._parentId_description: The ID of the parent competency category.
bodyCreateCompetencyCategory._description_description: The description of the competency category.

bodyUpdateCompetencyCategory._description: Request to update a Competency Category.
bodyUpdateCompetencyCategory._name_description: The name of the competency category
bodyUpdateCompetencyCategory.name: Competency Category 1
bodyUpdateCompetencyCategory._parentId_description: The ID of the parent competency category.
bodyUpdateCompetencyCategory._description_description: The description of the competency category
